forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
